title: Log based real-time replication with single master
description: This issue aims to add a real-time log based replication. The goal is to have the slave lag as less as possible after updates to the master by capturing the update commands in master and re-playing them on slaves. This will also pave the way for real-time search when Lucene adds those capabilities.
